events.details: Team Spirit drafts scaling lineup with PA carry. LGD opts for early-mid game timing with Luna
Nature's Prophet teleport gank secures first blood on Queen of Pain mid
Tier 1 safe lane tower falls, LGD pressuring hard
Tier 2 tower defense fails - LGD wins fight 4-1, Tidehunter Ravage catches 3
First Roshan secured by LGD, Aegis on Luna
High ground push - LGD takes melee barracks, wins fight 3-2
LGD reaches 18k gold lead - appears unbeatable
HUGE TURNAROUND! Spirit wins fight 4-0 near Rosh pit, PA crits delete Luna through Aegis
Team Spirit secures Roshan, Aegis on Phantom Assassin
Mid lane fight - Spirit wins 5-1, Mars spear catches 2 into Arena wall
Gold completely even - Spirit completed comeback from 18k deficit
LGD's base - Spirit aces LGD 5-0, PA has Divine Rapier
Ancient falls - Team Spirit completes miraculous comeback!

commentary:
In what will be remembered as one of the greatest comebacks in Dota 2 history, Team Spirit overcame an 18,000 gold deficit to defeat PSG.LGD in the TI12 Grand Finals.

The early game heavily favored LGD. Their aggressive Nature's Prophet rotations and Luna's farming efficiency created an insurmountable lead by 23 minutes. Most teams would have called GG, but Team Spirit refused to surrender.

The turning point came at 26:30 in a crucial Roshan pit fight. Despite being massively behind, Phantom Assassin's critical strikes deleted Luna through Aegis, and suddenly the game was alive again. This single fight shifted momentum completely.

Team Spirit's patience in defending high ground while their PA farmed proved critical. Each successful defense bought time, and each fight Spirit won chipped away at LGD's lead. The Mars-Bane combo consistently caught LGD heroes out of position.

By 34 minutes, the gold was even. LGD, who had seemed certain to win, now looked desperate. The final base push saw PA with Divine Rapier absolutely demolish LGD's lineup. Spirit aced them 5-0 and claimed the Aegis of Champions.

This match demonstrates that in Dota 2, the game is never truly over. Team Spirit's mental fortitude, perfect execution, and belief in their late-game composition created one of esports' most memorable moments.
